Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of ergonomic designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Ergonomic Designs / Total Ergonomic Designs) * 100

Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.KPIS: Time to Market for Ergonomic Designs
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of ergonomic designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: Total Time from Ergonomic Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the quality of ergonomic designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Ergonomic Designs

Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for ergonomic design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Ergonomic Design / Budgeted Cost for Ergonomic Design) * 100

Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for ergonomic designs.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Ergonomics / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of ergonomic designs that pass testing criteria.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Ergonomic Tests / Total Ergonomic Tests) * 100

Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in ergonomic designs.
Measures the average customer satisfaction score for ergonomic aspects of designs.
Product Development+Design+Ergonomics.FORMULA: (Sum of Ergonomic Feedback Ratings / Number of Feedback Responses)
